title: What Do You Do When Your Kid Unintentionally Offends Your Neighbors?
description:
Your four-year-old child loves meeting new people and imitating their accents. However, some people may take offense to this. So how do you explain to your child that mocking others' accents can be offensive?
This is what one listener is wondering after their child accidentally offended their neighbor.
